section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure an astral wasp that appears in 1 square within the target's space. It lasts until the end of your next turn.

The wasp's square is hazardous terrain that deals damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus to anyone who enters it. The squares adjacent to the wasp are difficult terrain.
If the target moves out of the astral wasp's square, it takes damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your Implement's enhancement bonus.
